AUTHOR: Kowlin
INSTALL_MSG: Thanks for installing Buyrole, to set this cog up use the command ``buyroleset``. For support go to the following discord server: https://kowlin.xyz/cogsupport
NAME: Buyrole
SHORT: Allow users to buy roles with Economy
DESCRIPTION: Allow your users to buy roles with Economy credits, this cog will apply and set the roles of users who are buying them.
